sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground } from 'docz'
import PixelMatrix from '../built/PixelMatrix'
import exampleImageUrl from './kawase.small.jpg'

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"api-reference"}}>{`API Reference`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"fromcanvas"}}>{`fromCanvas`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`const pixelMatrix = PixelMatrix.fromCanvas(canvas)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Creates a pixel matrix from a canvas, taking the canvas' width, height, and pixel data.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`import PixelMatrix from '@noisemachines/pixel-matrix'

// Create a canvas
const canvas = document.createElement('canvas')
canvas.width = 100
canvas.height = 100

// Fill it with coral red.
const context = canvas.getContext('2d')
context.fillStyle = 'rgb(222, 98, 98)'
context.fillRect(0, 0, 100, 100)

// pixelMatrix will copy over the width, height, and
// pixel contents of canvas. So in this case, it
// will be 100 x 100, and filled with a lovely
// coral red.
const pixelMatrix = PixelMatrix.fromCanvas(canvas)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"countpixels"}}>{`countPixels`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`const width = 10
const height = 10
const oneHundred = new PixelMatrix(width, height).countPixels
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The pixel matrix's width times its height.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"new-pixelmatrix"}}>{`new PixelMatrix`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`const pixelMatrix = new PixelMatrix(
  10, // width
  10, // height
  pixels // Uint8ClampedArray
)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`PixelMatrix constructor. The usual way to make new pixel matrices.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"get"}}>{`get`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`const pixel = pixelMatrix.get(point)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`point`}</MDXTag>{` is a JSON object like `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`{ x: 0, y : 0 }`}</MDXTag>{`. `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`pixel`}</MDXTag>{` is a JSON object like `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`{ red: 255, green: 255, blue: 255, alpha: 255 }`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"getrandompoint"}}>{`getRandomPoint`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`const point = pixelMatrix.getRandomPoint()
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Returns a random point in the pixel matrix.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"getrandompixel"}}>{`getRandomPixel`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`const pixel = pixelMatrix.getRandomPixel()
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Returns a random pixel from the pixel matrix.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"getvonneumannneighboringpixels"}}>{`getVonNeumannNeighboringPixels`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`const pixels = pixelMatrix.getVonNeumannNeighboringPixels(point)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Returns the pixels to the north, east, south, and west of `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`point`}</MDXTag>{`. In other words, the pixels in the `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Von_Neumann_neighborhood"}}>{`von Neumann neighborhood`}</MDXTag>{` around that point.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"getvonneumannneighboringpoints"}}>{`getVonNeumannNeighboringPoints`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`const points = pixelMatrix.getVonNeumannNeighboringPoints(point)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Returns the points to the north, east, south, and west of `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`point`}</MDXTag>{`. In other words, the points in the `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Von_Neumann_neighborhood"}}>{`von Neumann neighborhood`}</MDXTag>{` around that point.`}</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
